title: Module Parameters: session_archiver
description: Archives session outputs from a source session directory to a network destination, optionally writing a manifest and verifying checksums.

session_dir.description: Source session directory to archive. If omitted, the module uses the launcher's session folder.

network_dir.description: Destination directory on a network share.

backup_dir.description: Optional local backup directory used as an intermediate or fallback.

manifest_path.description: Optional path to a manifest file describing what was archived.

include_patterns.description: Glob(s) of files to include. If omitted, the module includes a default set (module-specific).

exclude_patterns.description: Glob(s) of files to exclude from archiving.

dry_run.description: If true, do not write/copy; only log intended operations.

skip_completed.description: If true, skip items that appear already archived.

remove_empty_dirs.description: If true, remove empty source directories after archiving.
